results.title: The New alchemists
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Colin Low and Dorothy Todd Henaut
results.brief_description: On a small farm, a group of people explore the possibilities for more self-sustaining communities involving interrelated food-producing systems and small scale technology. From the “Challenge for change” series”.

results.title: The New adventures of the Lone Ranger
results.brief_description: The New adventures of the Lone Ranger is an animated series celebrating the famous fictitious horse-riding hero of America, the Lone Ranger. Accompanied by his Indian friend Tonto and faithful horse Silver, the three pit themselves against train robbers, blackmailers and saboteurs to ‘always’ save the day in the name of good against evil.

results.title: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Columbia, Gary Mehlman, Walter Moshay and Ken Annakin
results.brief_description: Based on the classic book by Astrid Lindgren, Pippi Longstocking bursts on to the screen in this action film. Pippi is a pig-tailed, freckle-faced ball of fun and energy. Mischievous, lovable and always in trouble, Pippi is a young orphan who refuses to let anything stand in her way. Full of colourful characters, fun and laughs “The new adventures of Pippi Longstocking” is a delightful adventure movie for the young and the young at heart.

results.title: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
results.creator_credit: Columbia, Gary Mehlman, Walter Moshay and Ken Annakin
results.brief_description: Based on the classic books by Astrid Lindgren, Pippi Longstocking bursts onto the screen in this all new live action motion picture. Loved the world over by young and old, Pippi Longstocking is a pigtailed, freckle faced ball of fun and energy. Mischievous, lovable and always in trouble, Pippi is a young orphan who refuses to let anything stand in her way. Full of colourful characters, fun and laughs “The new adventures of Pippi Longstocking” is a delightful adventure movie for the young and the young at heart.

results.title: The New adventures of Pinocchio
results.creator_credit: TM, Creativ Berlin Filmpartner GmbH, Harald Reichebner, Knut Boesner, Jeffrey Sneller, Raju Patel and Michael Anderson
results.brief_description: Pinocchio (Gabriel Thomson) and best friend Lampwick (Ben Ridgeway) visit the carnival of Madame Flambeau (Udo Kier) and hear of the miracle elixir that she claims will act as the fountain of youth. On returning home and finding his father Gepetto (Martin Landau) exhausted and unable to complete producing toys, Pinocchio and Lampwick return to the carnival to get some of the elixir. Unbeknownst to Pinocchio, Flambeau knows about the puppet boy’s past and wanting to make him part of the show, produces a “special” potion. The effects of the elixir aren’t as expected and Gepetto and Lampwick are turned into wood. Having agreed to work for Flambeau until the price of the elixir is payed off, Pinocchio and his father are forced to work as an act in the show until they can think of a way to reverse the spell. Set in Luxembourg and featuring puppets created by the Jim Henson Group, “The New adventures of Pinocchio” should appeal to adults and children alike.

results.title: The Neverending story 2: the next chapter
results.creator_credit: Warner Bros Pictures, Dieter Geissler and George Miller
results.brief_description: Bastian (Jonathan Brandis), the reluctant hero of “The Neverending story” is unhappy away from Fantasia. His dad seems to have forgotten about his deceased mother and is dating someone Bastian doesn’t like, and Bastian didn’t make the swim team because he was afraid of heights and couldn’t jump off the diving board. He is drawn back to Fantasia to the friends he made; the Childlike Empress, Atreyu, Falkor, and Rock Biter. There are also fantastic new creatures to meet like Mudwart, Lavaman, Windbride, Instrument Spinster, Tri-Face, the Wamboes and Nimbly. There is a job to be done in Fanstasia however, as the sorceress Xayide and Smerg the evil dragon have unscrupulous plans for Fantasia. It’s up to Bastian and his friends to once again save Fantasia and prevent a disaster. Also starring Alexandra Johnes, Kenny Morrison, Clarissa Burt and John Wesley Shipp. This video also features a cartoon preview, “Box office bunny”, the first Bugs Bunny theatrical cartoon in 26 years.

results.title: The Neverending Story (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Bernard Eichinger, Dieter Geissler and Wolfgang Petersen
results.brief_description: A young boy escapes the neighbourhood bullies by retreating into a mysterious book that takes him into a shimmering fantasy world of creatures, giant forests and massive oceans. It is an awesome world, but a world in decay, and its existence is being threatened. Rated: G.

results.title: The Netsilik eskimo today
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, John Friedman, Francois Seguillon and Gilles Blais
results.brief_description: This film, made in 1972, shows the life of an Inuit family in the settlement of Pelly Bay inside the Arctic Circle. Under a federal government scheme, permanent heated housing, a school and a store are provided for the community. This film affords a glimpse of the Inuit adaptation to these changed conditions.
